Activity: Check emails and respond to any pending queries from the Health Informatics or EHR development teams.
Finalize the design of new tables for influenza-related data, including primary keys, foreign keys, and constraints.
Email @clinlead-1 and @pchmp-1 to validate the clinical relevance of the proposed table fields (e.g., symptom severity, vaccination dates).
Begin mapping specific EHR data elements to the corresponding columns in the new tables, starting with patient demographics and vaccination records.
Continue mapping EHR data elements, focusing on diagnosis codes and treatment records related to influenza.
Email @da-1 and @da-2 to confirm the data mapping aligns with their analysis requirements for seasonal influenza trends.
Review feedback and adjust the data mapping as needed. Document any unresolved issues for further discussion.
Update documentation and prepare for a mid-week review with the IT Project Manager.
